qti-assessment-item.title: Represent Pencil Lengths on a Line Plot

div.p: The lengths of 4 pencils were measured. The lengths are 11 cm, 8 cm, 8 cm, and 3 cm.

qti-choice-interaction.qti-prompt: Which line plot correctly shows the length of each pencil?

qti-content-body.p: Correct! The data set {11, 8, 8, 3} has one 3, two 8s, and one 11. You chose the plot that shows this correctly.
Not quite. Count how many times each number appears in the list {11, 8, 8, 3}. There should be a dot on the plot for each pencil.
